metadata.title: CVE-2023-52356 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A segment fault (SEGV) flaw was found in libtiff that could be triggered bypassing a crafted tiff file to the TIFFReadRGBATileExt() API. This flawallows a remote attacker to cause a heap-buffer overflow, leading to adenial of service.

criterions.comment: tiff package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
texmaker: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
